com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class SymmetricCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.SymmetricCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
SessionCryptoContext
public class SymmetricCryptoContext
extends Object
implements ICryptoContext

A symmetric crypto context performs AES-128 encryption/decryption, AES-128 key wrap/unwrap, and HMAC-SHA256 sign/verify.

Constructor Detail

SymmetricCryptoContext

public SymmetricCryptoContext(MslContext ctx,
                              String id,
                              SecretKey encryptionKey,
                              SecretKey hmacKey,
                              SecretKey wrappingKey)

Create a new symmetric crypto context using the provided keys.

If there is no encryption key, encryption and decryption is unsupported.

If there is no HMAC key, signing and verification is unsupported.

If there is no wrapping key, wrap and unwrap is unsupported.

Parameters:
ctx - MSL context.
id - the key set identity.
encryptionKey - the key used for encryption/decryption.
hmacKey - the key used for HMAC compuation.
wrappingKey - the key used for wrap/unwrap.

msb

private static byte[] msb(int bytes,
                          byte[] w)
Parameters:
bytes - number of bytes to return.
w - the value.
Returns:
the specified number of most significant (big-endian) bytes of the value.

                          byte[] w)
Parameters:

w - the value.
Returns:
the specified number of least significant (big-endian) bytes of the value.

xor

private static void xor(byte[] b,
                        long t)
Modifies the provided byte array by XOR'ing it with the provided value. The byte array is processed in big-endian order.

Parameters:
b - 8-byte value that will be modified.
t - the 64-bit value to XOR the value with.
